entities.name: Paper
entities.description: An individual scientific paper, identified by its title or DOI.

entities.name: Hypothesis
entities.description: A scientific claim or hypothesis stated within a paper.

entities.name: Result
entities.description: Experimental or observational results presented within a paper.

relations.name: supports
relations.description: Indicates that a result or finding supports a hypothesis.

relations.name: contradicts
relations.description: Indicates that a result or finding contradicts a hypothesis.

patterns.head: Result
patterns.description: A result that provides support for a hypothesis.

patterns.head: Result
patterns.description: A result that provides evidence against a hypothesis.
